inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: tremors since a year ago, continuous and extended to both hands and legs and even at rest

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: low serum caeruloplasmin (0.05 g/l), raised 24 hour urine copper excretion (120 μg/24 h)

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: generally good health as evidenced by previous medical history and clinical examination

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: allowed to take Beta-blockers but will not be allowed to take any other medication for tremor

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: able to abstain from alcohol for 24 hours prior to each evaluation

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no prior surgical treatment for tremor

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: currently taking more than a single drug for ET

notes: Patient has Wilson disease confirmed by high liver copper concentration. He is in generally good health and meets most inclusion criteria, but exclusion criteria related to medication dose and pregnancy status are unclear.
